attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To all Briton's

Please sign this pettition for the proper support assistance needed by many current and ex - Gurkha soldiers.

They have served our country and our principles for many years, they had nothing to do with the British empire or Britian, however they felt it a proud thing to do to fight and defend British soldiers.

The way that they are treated by this goverment is appauling.  Shame on you mr Blair and mr Brown.

My great uncle faught in Burma in 1942-45 and the one thing he remembers most is that a Gurkha saved his life from a Japanese attack.  If that Gurkha had not been there he would not be here today.

They deserve good pay, the chance to live in Britian.  Friendship and support from theis nations people.

We all owe them our gratitued and thanks.

Please help them

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
